Crypto-method-getRandomValues.summary: The Crypto.getRandomValues() method lets you get cryptographically strong random values. The array given as the parameter is filled with random numbers (random in its cryptographic meaning).
Crypto-method-getRandomValues.title: Crypto.getRandomValues()

SubtleCrypto-method-decrypt.summary: The SubtleCrypto.decrypt() method decrypts some encrypted data. It takes as arguments a key to decrypt with, some optional extra parameters, and the data to decrypt (also known as ciphertext). It returns a Promise which will be resolved with the decrypted data (also known as "plaintext").
SubtleCrypto-method-decrypt.title: SubtleCrypto.decrypt()

crypto-interface.summary: The Crypto interface represents basic cryptography features available in the current context. It allows access to a cryptographically strong random number generator and to cryptographic primitives.
crypto-interface.title: Crypto

dfn-Crypto.summary: The Crypto.subtle read-only property returns a SubtleCrypto object allowing to perform cryptographical operations.
dfn-Crypto.title: Crypto.subtle

dfn-CryptoKey.summary: The CryptoKey interface represents a cryptographic key derived from a specific key algorithm.
dfn-CryptoKey.title: CryptoKey

dfn-CryptoKey-algorithm.summary: The CryptoKey.algorithm read-only property is an opaque value containing all the information about the algorithm related to the key.
dfn-CryptoKey-algorithm.title: CryptoKey.algorithm

dfn-CryptoKey-extractable.summary: The CryptoKey.extractable read-only property that indicates if the raw material key can be extracted, for example for archiving it.
dfn-CryptoKey-extractable.title: CryptoKey.extractable

dfn-CryptoKey-type.summary: The CryptoKey.type read-only property that indicates the type of the key: if it is the key for a symmetric algorithm ("secret") or for an asymmetric algorithm ("public" or "private", depending of its purpose).
dfn-CryptoKey-type.title: CryptoKey.type

dfn-CryptoKey-usages.summary: The CryptoKey.usages read-only property is an array of enumerated that indicates the purposes of the key.
dfn-CryptoKey-usages.title: CryptoKey.usages

dfn-GlobalCrypto.summary: The Window.crypto read-only property returns the Crypto object associated to the global object. This object allows web pages access to certain cryptographic related services.
dfn-GlobalCrypto.title: Window.crypto

dfn-SubtleCrypto-method-deriveKey.summary: The SubtleCrypto.deriveKey() method can be used to derive a secret key from a master key.
dfn-SubtleCrypto-method-deriveKey.title: SubtleCrypto.deriveKey()

dfn-SubtleCrypto-method-digest.summary: The SubtleCrypto.digest() method generates a digest of the given data.
dfn-SubtleCrypto-method-digest.title: SubtleCrypto.digest()

dfn-SubtleCrypto-method-exportKey.summary: The SubtleCrypto.exportKey() method returns a Promise of the key encrypted in the requested format. If the key is not extractable, that is if CryptoKey.extractable returns false, the promise fails with an InvalidAccessError exception; it the format is unknown, the promise fails with a NotSupported exception.
dfn-SubtleCrypto-method-exportKey.title: SubtleCrypto.exportKey()

dfn-SubtleCrypto-method-generateKey.summary: Use the SubtleCrypto.generateKey() method to generate a new key (for symmetric algorithms) or key pair (for public-key algorithms).
dfn-SubtleCrypto-method-generateKey.title: SubtleCrypto.generateKey()

dfn-SubtleCrypto-method-importKey.summary: The SubtleCrypto.importKey() method imports a key: that is, it takes as input a key in an external, portable format and gives you a CryptoKey object that you can use in the Web Crypto API.
dfn-SubtleCrypto-method-importKey.title: SubtleCrypto.importKey()

dfn-SubtleCrypto-method-sign.summary: The SubtleCrypto.sign() method generates a digital signature.
dfn-SubtleCrypto-method-sign.title: SubtleCrypto.sign()

dfn-SubtleCrypto-method-unwrapKey.summary: The SubtleCrypto.unwrapKey() method returns a Promise of a CryptoKey corresponding to the wrapped key given in parameter.
dfn-SubtleCrypto-method-unwrapKey.title: SubtleCrypto.unwrapKey()

dfn-SubtleCrypto-method-verify.summary: The SubtleCrypto.verify() method verifies a digital signature.
dfn-SubtleCrypto-method-verify.title: SubtleCrypto.verify()

dfn-SubtleCrypto-method-wrapKey.summary: The SubtleCrypto.wrapKey() method returns a Promise of a wrapped symmetric key, so the key is protected when in storage or transmission in untrusted environments. The wrapped buffer returned is in the format given in parameters, and contains the key wrapped by the given wrapping key with the given algorithm.
dfn-SubtleCrypto-method-wrapKey.title: SubtleCrypto.wrapKey()

subtlecrypto-interface.summary: The SubtleCrypto interface represents a set of cryptographic primitives. It is available via the Crypto.subtle properties available in a window context (via Window.crypto).
subtlecrypto-interface.title: SubtleCrypto
